dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That footage from the Taraz railway crossing is just, uh, really hard to watch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That footage from the Taraz railway crossing is just, uh, really hard to watch.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? A freight train, a minibus, and a Mercedes all involved on May 4th. It's a miracle that, um, the bus driver and passengers were unharmed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? A freight train, a minibus, and a Mercedes all involved on May fourth. It's a miracle that, um, the bus driver and passengers were unharmed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A freight train, a Dongfeng minibus, and a Mercedes passenger car were involved in a traffic accident at a railway crossing in Taraz on May 4, according to the Zhambyl Regional Police Department. Authorities confirmed that the driver and passengers of the bus were unharmed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously. And even the people in the Mercedes didn't need to go to the hospital. Just got checked out and released.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously. And even the people in the Mercedes didn't need to go to the hospital. Just got checked out and released.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The driver and a passenger in the Mercedes also did not require hospitalization and were released after a medical examination.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but you've gotta wonder how that even occurs at a railway crossing. Like, were there immediately? The Zhambyl police said emergency crews responded fast.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but you've gotta wonder how that even occurs at a railway crossing. Like, were there immediately? The Zhambyl police said emergency crews responded fast.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They did, and now they're doing the whole on-site investigation, impounding the vehicles, ordering forensic tests... it's a full procedure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They did, and now they're doing the whole on-site investigation, impounding the vehicles, ordering forensic tests... it's a full procedure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Police officers are conducting an on-site investigation and collecting evidence. Necessary forensic tests have been ordered, and the vehicles have been impounded, the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes sense. You can't be too careful with something this serious. But it does remind me of that other accident they mentioned.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes sense. You can't be too careful with something this serious. But it does remind me of that other accident they mentioned.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, in the Abai region? With the three men and the motorcycle on the suspension bridge? That one was just tragic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, in the Abai region? With the three men and the motorcycle on the suspension bridge? That one was just tragic.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, a tragic accident occurred in the Abai region when three men fell into a river while trying to transport a motorcycle across a suspension bridge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Two very different outcomes, but both just so preventable, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Two very different outcomes, but both just so preventable, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Rail crossings and unstable bridges... it's a reminder to always err on the side of caution.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Rail crossings and unstable bridges... it's a reminder to always err on the side of caution.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Hopefully the investigation in Taraz leads to some clearer safety measures or awareness.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Hopefully the investigation in Taraz leads to some clearer safety measures or awareness.
